title: Giovanni Camputaro
text: Giovanni Camputaro (born 6 April 1955) is an Italian <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201976%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Flyweight">men's flyweight</a> event at the <a href="1976%20Summer%20Olympics">1976 Summer Olympics</a>.
